pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:1.3: According to [](Sp.2.604) this means the bean-curries should make up one quarter of the food: _Samasūpako nāma yattha bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo sūpo hoti_.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:1.5: (Sujato) I have corrected the punctuation of the MS edition here so as to agree with Samasūpakasikkhāpada. Here the text mistakenly had _hatthahāriyo_ in the next sentence.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:1.13: _Rasarase_. According to [](Kkh.) this means any curries apart from bean curry: _ṭhapetvā pana sūpaṃ avasesā sabbā pi sūpeyyabyañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hoti_. My translation, however, is based on the fact that all other foods too are excluded.
